Health Pot.description: Instantly heals for 20 HP - Single time use.

Mana Pot.description: Instantly grants 10 MP - Single time use.

Rock.description: Throw a rock at a target and deal damage - Single time use.

Lesser Healing Pot.description: Heals 8 health over the course of 2 turns - Single time use.

Damaging Tonic.description: Throw at an enemy and damage them for 32 damage over 4 turns - Single time use.

Blessed Water.description: Mysterious water, perhaps drinking it will do something - Single time use.
